text: **b. Disciplinary actions including penalties imposed by SEBI or stock exchanges in the last five financial years including outstanding actions**
**c. Outstanding actions by regulatory and statutory authorities**
**III. Litigation involving our Key Managerial Personnel (other than our Directors)**
**a. Criminal proceedings against our Key Managerial Personnel**
**b. Criminal proceedings by our Key Managerial Personnel**
**c. Actions and proceedings initiated by statutory/regulatory authorities against our Key Managerial Personnel**
**IV. Litigation involving our Senior Management (other than our Directors)**
**a. Criminal proceedings against our Senior Management**
**b. Criminal proceedings by our Senior Management**
**c. Actions and proceedings initiated by statutory/regulatory authorities against our Senior Management**

Our Board, in its meeting held on September 30, 2025 has considered and adopted the Materiality Policy. In terms of the Materiality Policy, creditors of our Company on consolidated basis, to whom an amount exceeding â‚¹ 225.85
